Override.entitydescription.combatdivingsuit: An agile, lightweight suit designed for combat. Offers some protection against damage and withstands pressure up to a depth of 5,700 meters.
Override.entitydescription.slipsuit: A modified Combat Suit fitted with an air scooter to allow for aerial movement. Sadly, the propulsion system also make it heavy and thus difficult to walk on solid ground. Withstands pressure up to a depth of 5,700 meters.
Override.entitydescription.cargoscooter: An aerial scooter special-made to transport material in the air. While the scooter is too large to be stored in one's inventory, its heft is justified by its powerful propeller.
Override.entitydescription.extinguisher: A handheld carbon dioxide extinguisher. Crouch whilst using this or you'll fly away!
Override.entitydescription.harpoongun: Launches harpoons, explosive harpoons, and alien harpoons. Can be used as a grappling hook gun.
Override.entitydescription.harpooncoilrifle: An advanced harpoon gun, powered by an energy source to launch harpoons at high velocities. Can be used as a grappling hook gun.
Override.entitydescription.spear: A harpoon for the harpoon gun. Can be used as a grappling hook.
Override.entitydescription.alienspear: A harpoon for the harpoon gun, made of alien material. Can be used as a grappling hook.
Override.entitydescription.spearunique: An antique spear named after a legendary captain. Can be used as a grappling hook.
